channel.title: GitHub Actions on Awaiting Bits
channel.description: Recent content in GitHub Actions on Awaiting Bits

item.title: Deploy Blazor WASM to GitHub Pages using GitHub Actions
item.description: Blazor WebAssembly was out a couple of weeks ago, and I can’t stop playing with it! It’s such a refreshing pause from all the JavaScript SPA frameworks. As with any other SPA framework, you can deploy Blazor WASM in Github Pages! Today I’ll be showing you step by step how to do so.
